user.title: Configure Daikin AC
user.description:
Enter the IP address of your Daikin AC.

Note that API key and password are only used by BRP072Cxx and SKYFi devices respectively.

error.api_password: Invalid authentication, use either API Key or Password.

set_zone_temperature.name: Set zone temperature
set_zone_temperature.description: Sets a zone's target temperature on a compatible Daikin device.

zone_id.name: Zone ID
zone_id.description: ID of the zone (0-10) to set the temperature for

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature to set in °C. Must be within ±2°C of the main system's target temperature.

entry_id.name: Config entry
entry_id.description: Specific Daikin config entry to target when multiple devices are available

service_target_not_found.message: No Daikin devices matched the action's target. Specify an entity or config entry.

service_entry_not_found.message: Daikin config entry {entry_id} is not loaded.

zone_inactive.message: Zone {zone_id} is not active. Enable the zone on your Daikin device first.

zone_missing.message: Zone {zone_id} does not exist. Available zones are 0-{max_zone}.

temperature_out_of_range.message: Temperature {temperature}°C is outside the supported range ({min_temp}°C - {max_temp}°C).

zone_settings_unavailable.message: Failed to retrieve zone settings. This device may not support zone temperature control.

zone_parameters_unavailable.message: This device does not expose the required zone temperature parameters.

zone_set_failed.message: Failed to set zone temperature. The device may not support this operation.

zone_set_retries_exceeded.message: Failed to set zone temperature after {retries} attempts. The device may not support zone temperature control.
